Trans. Angela. To proof.
Melbourne bot. Garden

I have the honor to express my best thanks for your goodness of providing for the repayments of the one hundred and fifty pounds, which two years ago I paid out of my slender private means, to effect then at once the transfer of the Dromedaries to the Queensland Government without any accumulating costs. This sum having recently been voted by the Legislation Assembly I beg now to ask, that you will be pleased to issue authority for the pament of this sum.
